Python Code python
import requests import json import os import time from datetime import datetime print("Executing comprehensive web search for 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' organization...") # Load the search configuration from previous iteration config_file = "workspace/search_configuration.json" if os.path.exists(config_file): print(f"\nLoading search configuration from {config_file}") with open(config_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: search_config = json.load(f) primary_urls = search_config.get('primary_urls', []) target_keywords = search_config.get('keywords', []) print(f"Loaded configuration with {len(primary_urls)} URLs and {len(target_keywords)} keywords") else: print("No search configuration found - using default search parameters") primary_urls = [ "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rio_São_Francisco", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bacia_do_rio_São_Francisco", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/CODEVASF", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comitê_da_Bacia_Hidrográfica_do_Rio_São_Francisco", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barragem_de_Sobradinho", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Movimento_dos_Atingidos_por_Barragens", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Instituto_Socioambiental", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Educação_ambiental" ] target_keywords = [ 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco', '505 municípios', 'Ministérios Públicos', 'Sobradinho deslocados', 'educação ambiental bacia São Francisco' ] def get_page_content(url, timeout=30): """Fetch content from a URL with proper headers and error handling""" headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36', 'Accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8', 'Accept-Language': 'pt-BR,pt;q=0.9,en;q=0.8', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Connection': 'keep-alive' } try: print(f"Fetching: {url}") response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=timeout) response.raise_for_status() print(f"✓ Successfully fetched: {url} ({len(response.text):,} characters)") return response.text except requests.exceptions.Timeout: print(f"✗ Timeout error for {url}") return None except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e: print(f"✗ Request error for {url}: {str(e)}") return None except Exception as e: print(f"✗ Unexpected error for {url}: {str(e)}") return None def analyze_content_for_specific_plan(content, keywords): """Analyze content specifically for the education plan and related evidence""" if not content: return [], [] content_lower = content.lower() found_keywords = [] relevant_sections = [] for keyword in keywords: keyword_lower = keyword.lower() if keyword_lower in content_lower: found_keywords.append(keyword) # Find all occurrences of the keyword start_pos = 0 occurrence_count = 0 while occurrence_count < 3: # Limit to 3 occurrences per keyword pos = content_lower.find(keyword_lower, start_pos) if pos == -1: break # Extract larger context around keyword (1200 chars before and after) section_start = max(0, pos - 1200) section_end = min(len(content), pos + 1200) section = content[section_start:section_end] relevant_sections.append({ 'keyword': keyword, 'section': section, 'position': pos, 'occurrence': occurrence_count + 1 }) start_pos = pos + len(keyword_lower) occurrence_count += 1 return found_keywords, relevant_sections print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("COMPREHENSIVE WEB SEARCH FOR SÃO FRANCISCO ENVIRONMENTAL EDUCATION PLAN") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"\nSearching {len(primary_urls)} URLs for {len(target_keywords)} specific keywords...") print(f"Focus: Identify organization behind 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' covering 505 municipalities") # Storage for search results search_results = {} search_analysis = {} # Execute comprehensive web search for i, url in enumerate(primary_urls, 1): # Clean page name for storage page_name = url.split('/')[-1].replace('%C3%A3', 'a').replace('%C3%A1', 'a').replace('%C3%BA', 'u').replace('%C3%A9', 'e').replace('%C3%A7', 'c').replace('%C3%AD', 'i').replace('%C3%B4', 'o') print(f"\n[{i}/{len(primary_urls)}] Processing: {page_name}") content = get_page_content(url) if content: # Store content search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'content_length': len(content), 'content': content, 'fetch_time': datetime.now().isoformat() } # Analyze content for specific plan evidence print(f"Analyzing content for education plan evidence...") found_keywords, relevant_sections = analyze_content_for_specific_plan(content, target_keywords) search_analysis[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': found_keywords, 'relevant_sections': relevant_sections, 'keyword_count': len(found_keywords), 'section_count': len(relevant_sections) } print(f"✓ Found {len(found_keywords)} keywords, {len(relevant_sections)} relevant sections") if found_keywords: print(f"Keywords: {', '.join(found_keywords[:4])}{'...' if len(found_keywords) > 4 else ''}") else: # Store error information search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'error': 'Failed to fetch content', 'content_length': 0, 'content': '', 'fetch_time': datetime.now().isoformat() } search_analysis[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': [], 'relevant_sections': [], 'keyword_count': 0, 'section_count': 0, 'error': 'Failed to fetch content' } # Add delay between requests to be respectful time.sleep(2) # Save comprehensive search results results_file = "workspace/comprehensive_search_results.json" with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_analysis, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nComprehensive search results saved to {results_file}") # Generate search statistics search_stats = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'urls_searched': len(search_results), 'successful_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if 'error' not in r]), 'failed_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if 'error' in r]), 'total_keywords_found': sum(r.get('keyword_count', 0) for r in search_analysis.values()), 'total_sections_found': sum(r.get('section_count', 0) for r in search_analysis.values()), 'keywords_searched': len(target_keywords) } print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH RESULTS ANALYSIS") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"\nSEARCH STATISTICS:") print(f"URLs searched: {search_stats['urls_searched']}") print(f"Successful fetches: {search_stats['successful_fetches']}") print(f"Failed fetches: {search_stats['failed_fetches']}") print(f"Keywords searched: {search_stats['keywords_searched']}") print(f"Total keywords found: {search_stats['total_keywords_found']}") print(f"Total relevant sections: {search_stats['total_sections_found']}") # Display results by page print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("SEARCH RESULTS BY PAGE") print(f"{'='*60}") for page_name, results in search_analysis.items(): if results.get('keyword_count', 0) > 0: print(f"\n📄 {page_name}") print(f" URL: {results['url']}") print(f" Keywords found ({results['keyword_count']}): {', '.join(results['found_keywords'][:4])}{'...' if len(results['found_keywords']) > 4 else ''}") print(f" Relevant sections: {results['section_count']}") elif 'error' in results: print(f"\n❌ {page_name} - Error: {results['error']}") else: print(f"\n⚪ {page_name} - No relevant keywords found") # Analyze for specific evidence patterns print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("ANALYZING FOR SPECIFIC ORGANIZATION AND PLAN EVIDENCE") print(f"{'='*60}") # Look for specific evidence patterns exact_plan_evidence = [] municipalities_505_evidence = [] ministry_collaboration_evidence = [] sobradinho_advocacy_evidence = [] organization_identification = [] for page_name, results in search_analysis.items(): for section in results.get('relevant_sections', []): section_text = section['section'].lower() section_content = section['section'] # Look for exact plan name if 'plano de educação ambiental da bacia do rio são francisco' in section_text: exact_plan_evidence.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': section_content, 'keyword': section['keyword'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for 505 municipalities evidence if '505' in section_text and ('municípios' in section_text or 'municipalities' in section_text): municipalities_505_evidence.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': section_content, 'keyword': section['keyword'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for ministry collaboration if ('ministério' in section_text and 'público' in section_text) or 'mpf' in section_text: ministry_collaboration_evidence.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': section_content, 'keyword': section['keyword'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for Sobradinho advocacy evidence if 'sobradinho' in section_text and ('deslocad' in section_text or 'atingid' in section_text or 'advocacia' in section_text or 'defesa' in section_text): sobradinho_advocacy_evidence.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': section_content, 'keyword': section['keyword'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for organization identification organizations = ['codevasf', 'cbhsf', 'ana', 'fundaj', 'isa', 'instituto socioambiental', 'mab', 'movimento dos atingidos', 'cpt', 'comissão pastoral'] if any(org in section_text for org in organizations) and ('educação ambiental' in section_text or 'são francisco' in section_text): organization_identification.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': section_content, 'keyword': section['keyword'], 'url': results['url'], 'organizations_mentioned': [org for org in organizations if org in section_text] }) # Display key findings print(f"\n📋 EXACT PLAN NAME EVIDENCE: {len(exact_plan_evidence)}") for i, evidence in enumerate(exact_plan_evidence[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. From {evidence['source']}:") print(f" {evidence['section'][:500]}...") print(f"\n🏛️ 505 MUNICIPALITIES EVIDENCE: {len(municipalities_505_evidence)}") for i, evidence in enumerate(municipalities_505_evidence[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. From {evidence['source']}:") print(f" {evidence['section'][:500]}...") print(f"\n⚖️ MINISTRY COLLABORATION EVIDENCE: {len(ministry_collaboration_evidence)}") for i, evidence in enumerate(ministry_collaboration_evidence[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. From {evidence['source']}:") print(f" {evidence['section'][:500]}...") print(f"\n🏗️ SOBRADINHO ADVOCACY EVIDENCE: {len(sobradinho_advocacy_evidence)}") for i, evidence in enumerate(sobradinho_advocacy_evidence[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. From {evidence['source']}:") print(f" {evidence['section'][:500]}...") print(f"\n🏢 ORGANIZATION IDENTIFICATION: {len(organization_identification)}") for i, evidence in enumerate(organization_identification[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. From {evidence['source']}:") print(f" Organizations: {', '.join(evidence['organizations_mentioned'])}") print(f" {evidence['section'][:400]}...") # Save comprehensive findings comprehensive_findings = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_statistics': search_stats, 'exact_plan_evidence': exact_plan_evidence, 'municipalities_505_evidence': municipalities_505_evidence, 'ministry_collaboration_evidence': ministry_collaboration_evidence, 'sobradinho_advocacy_evidence': sobradinho_advocacy_evidence, 'organization_identification': organization_identification, 'search_keywords': target_keywords, 'pages_searched': list(search_analysis.keys()) } findings_file = "workspace/final_comprehensive_findings.json" with open(findings_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(comprehensive_findings, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nComprehensive findings saved to {findings_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("ORGANIZATION IDENTIFICATION ANALYSIS") print(f"{'='*80}") # Analyze evidence to identify the most likely organization total_evidence = len(exact_plan_evidence) + len(municipalities_505_evidence) + len(ministry_collaboration_evidence) + len(sobradinho_advocacy_evidence) if total_evidence > 0: print(f"\n✅ FOUND {total_evidence} PIECES OF RELEVANT EVIDENCE") # Count organization mentions across all evidence org_mentions = {} all_evidence = exact_plan_evidence + municipalities_505_evidence + ministry_collaboration_evidence + sobradinho_advocacy_evidence + organization_identification for evidence in all_evidence: section = evidence['section'].lower() # Count specific organizations if 'codevasf' in section: org_mentions['CODEVASF'] = org_mentions.get('CODEVASF', 0) + 1 if 'cbhsf' in section or 'comitê da bacia hidrográfica' in section: org_mentions['CBHSF (Comitê da Bacia Hidrográfica do Rio São Francisco)'] = org_mentions.get('CBHSF (Comitê da Bacia Hidrográfica do Rio São Francisco)', 0) + 1 if 'ana' in section and ('agência nacional' in section or 'águas' in section): org_mentions['ANA (Agência Nacional de Águas)'] = org_mentions.get('ANA (Agência Nacional de Águas)', 0) + 1 if 'fundaj' in section or 'fundação joaquim nabuco' in section: org_mentions['FUNDAJ (Fundação Joaquim Nabuco)'] = org_mentions.get('FUNDAJ (Fundação Joaquim Nabuco)', 0) + 1 if 'instituto socioambiental' in section or 'isa' in section: org_mentions['ISA (Instituto Socioambiental)'] = org_mentions.get('ISA (Instituto Socioambiental)', 0) + 1 if 'movimento dos atingidos' in section or 'mab' in section: org_mentions['MAB (Movimento dos Atingidos por Barragens)'] = org_mentions.get('MAB (Movimento dos Atingidos por Barragens)', 0) + 1 if org_mentions: print(f"\nORGANIZATION MENTIONS IN EVIDENCE:") for org, count in sorted(org_mentions.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True): print(f" - {org}: {count} mentions") most_mentioned_org = max(org_mentions.items(), key=lambda x: x[1]) print(f"\n🎯 MOST LIKELY ORGANIZATION: {most_mentioned_org[0]} ({most_mentioned_org[1]} mentions)") else: print(f"\n⚠️ No specific organization clearly identified from current evidence") print(f"Need to search for more specific sources or use different search terms") print(f"\nNEXT STEPS:") print(f"- Focus on the most mentioned organizations") print(f"- Search for individuals within these organizations") print(f"- Look for specific advocacy work related to Sobradinho Dam") print(f"- Search for collaboration with Ministérios Públicos") else: print(f"\n⚠️ NO DIRECT EVIDENCE FOUND FOR SPECIFIC PLAN") print(f"The 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' covering 505 municipalities") print(f"may not be documented in Wikipedia or may have a different name.") print(f"\nRECOMMENDATIONS:") print(f"- Search government websites and official documents") print(f"- Look for environmental education programs by basin organizations") print(f"- Search for NGO reports and publications") print(f"- Check academic papers and research on São Francisco basin") print(f"\nComprehensive search completed successfully!") print(f"Found {search_stats['total_keywords_found']} total keyword matches across {search_stats['successful_fetches']} pages.")

Tester Feedback
Tester Feedback:
Execution successful - Code ran without errors and completed the comprehensive web search as intended. The script successfully fetched content from 7 out of 10 URLs (3 failed), found 27 keywords across 69 relevant sections, and conducted detailed analysis for specific evidence patterns. The search identified key organizations mentioned in relation to São Francisco basin work including CODEVASF, CBHSF, ANA, ISA, and MAB with varying levels of evidence. However, the critical finding is that NO direct evidence was found for the specific 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' covering 505 municipalities - this suggests the plan may not be documented in Wikipedia sources or may have a different name. The code correctly concluded that the plan might be from organizations not covered in Wikipedia and recommended searching government websites, NGO reports, and academic papers. **PLAN** alignment: 85% complete - successfully conducted comprehensive search and analysis, but the specific plan and organization were not found in Wikipedia sources. The search results and analysis have been saved to workspace files for reference. Next step: Since Wikipedia search was exhaustive but unsuccessful, recommend expanding to non-Wikipedia sources like government websites, NGO publications, and academic databases to locate this specific environmental education plan and the organization behind it.
Python Code python
import requests import json import os import time from datetime import datetime print("Executing comprehensive web search for 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' organization...") # Load the search configuration from previous iteration config_file = "workspace/search_configuration.json" if os.path.exists(config_file): print(f"\nLoading search configuration from {config_file}") with open(config_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: search_config = json.load(f) primary_urls = search_config.get('primary_urls', []) target_keywords = search_config.get('keywords', []) print(f"Loaded configuration with {len(primary_urls)} URLs and {len(target_keywords)} keywords") else: print("No search configuration found - using default search parameters") primary_urls = [ "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rio_São_Francisco", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bacia_do_rio_São_Francisco", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/CODEVASF", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comitê_da_Bacia_Hidrográfica_do_Rio_São_Francisco", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barragem_de_Sobradinho", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Movimento_dos_Atingidos_por_Barragens", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Instituto_Socioambiental", "https://pt.wikipedia.org/wiki/Educação_ambiental" ] target_keywords = [ 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco', '505 municípios', 'Ministérios Públicos', 'Sobradinho deslocados', 'educação ambiental bacia São Francisco' ] def get_page_content(url, timeout=30): """Fetch content from a URL with proper headers and error handling""" headers = { 'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36', 'Accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8', 'Accept-Language': 'pt-BR,pt;q=0.9,en;q=0.8', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Connection': 'keep-alive' } try: print(f"Fetching: {url}") response = requests.get(url, headers=headers, timeout=timeout) response.raise_for_status() print(f"✓ Successfully fetched: {url} ({len(response.text):,} characters)") return response.text except requests.exceptions.Timeout: print(f"✗ Timeout error for {url}") return None except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e: print(f"✗ Request error for {url}: {str(e)}") return None except Exception as e: print(f"✗ Unexpected error for {url}: {str(e)}") return None def analyze_content_for_specific_plan(content, keywords): """Analyze content specifically for the education plan and related evidence""" if not content: return [], [] content_lower = content.lower() found_keywords = [] relevant_sections = [] for keyword in keywords: keyword_lower = keyword.lower() if keyword_lower in content_lower: found_keywords.append(keyword) # Find all occurrences of the keyword start_pos = 0 occurrence_count = 0 while occurrence_count < 3: # Limit to 3 occurrences per keyword pos = content_lower.find(keyword_lower, start_pos) if pos == -1: break # Extract larger context around keyword (1200 chars before and after) section_start = max(0, pos - 1200) section_end = min(len(content), pos + 1200) section = content[section_start:section_end] relevant_sections.append({ 'keyword': keyword, 'section': section, 'position': pos, 'occurrence': occurrence_count + 1 }) start_pos = pos + len(keyword_lower) occurrence_count += 1 return found_keywords, relevant_sections print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("COMPREHENSIVE WEB SEARCH FOR SÃO FRANCISCO ENVIRONMENTAL EDUCATION PLAN") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"\nSearching {len(primary_urls)} URLs for {len(target_keywords)} specific keywords...") print(f"Focus: Identify organization behind 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' covering 505 municipalities") # Storage for search results search_results = {} search_analysis = {} # Execute comprehensive web search for i, url in enumerate(primary_urls, 1): # Clean page name for storage page_name = url.split('/')[-1].replace('%C3%A3', 'a').replace('%C3%A1', 'a').replace('%C3%BA', 'u').replace('%C3%A9', 'e').replace('%C3%A7', 'c').replace('%C3%AD', 'i').replace('%C3%B4', 'o') print(f"\n[{i}/{len(primary_urls)}] Processing: {page_name}") content = get_page_content(url) if content: # Store content search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'content_length': len(content), 'content': content, 'fetch_time': datetime.now().isoformat() } # Analyze content for specific plan evidence print(f"Analyzing content for education plan evidence...") found_keywords, relevant_sections = analyze_content_for_specific_plan(content, target_keywords) search_analysis[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': found_keywords, 'relevant_sections': relevant_sections, 'keyword_count': len(found_keywords), 'section_count': len(relevant_sections) } print(f"✓ Found {len(found_keywords)} keywords, {len(relevant_sections)} relevant sections") if found_keywords: print(f"Keywords: {', '.join(found_keywords[:4])}{'...' if len(found_keywords) > 4 else ''}") else: # Store error information search_results[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'error': 'Failed to fetch content', 'content_length': 0, 'content': '', 'fetch_time': datetime.now().isoformat() } search_analysis[page_name] = { 'url': url, 'found_keywords': [], 'relevant_sections': [], 'keyword_count': 0, 'section_count': 0, 'error': 'Failed to fetch content' } # Add delay between requests to be respectful time.sleep(2) # Save comprehensive search results results_file = "workspace/comprehensive_search_results.json" with open(results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(search_analysis, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nComprehensive search results saved to {results_file}") # Generate search statistics search_stats = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'urls_searched': len(search_results), 'successful_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if 'error' not in r]), 'failed_fetches': len([r for r in search_results.values() if 'error' in r]), 'total_keywords_found': sum(r.get('keyword_count', 0) for r in search_analysis.values()), 'total_sections_found': sum(r.get('section_count', 0) for r in search_analysis.values()), 'keywords_searched': len(target_keywords) } print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH RESULTS ANALYSIS") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"\nSEARCH STATISTICS:") print(f"URLs searched: {search_stats['urls_searched']}") print(f"Successful fetches: {search_stats['successful_fetches']}") print(f"Failed fetches: {search_stats['failed_fetches']}") print(f"Keywords searched: {search_stats['keywords_searched']}") print(f"Total keywords found: {search_stats['total_keywords_found']}") print(f"Total relevant sections: {search_stats['total_sections_found']}") # Display results by page print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("SEARCH RESULTS BY PAGE") print(f"{'='*60}") for page_name, results in search_analysis.items(): if results.get('keyword_count', 0) > 0: print(f"\n📄 {page_name}") print(f" URL: {results['url']}") print(f" Keywords found ({results['keyword_count']}): {', '.join(results['found_keywords'][:4])}{'...' if len(results['found_keywords']) > 4 else ''}") print(f" Relevant sections: {results['section_count']}") elif 'error' in results: print(f"\n❌ {page_name} - Error: {results['error']}") else: print(f"\n⚪ {page_name} - No relevant keywords found") # Analyze for specific evidence patterns print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("ANALYZING FOR SPECIFIC ORGANIZATION AND PLAN EVIDENCE") print(f"{'='*60}") # Look for specific evidence patterns exact_plan_evidence = [] municipalities_505_evidence = [] ministry_collaboration_evidence = [] sobradinho_advocacy_evidence = [] organization_identification = [] for page_name, results in search_analysis.items(): for section in results.get('relevant_sections', []): section_text = section['section'].lower() section_content = section['section'] # Look for exact plan name if 'plano de educação ambiental da bacia do rio são francisco' in section_text: exact_plan_evidence.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': section_content, 'keyword': section['keyword'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for 505 municipalities evidence if '505' in section_text and ('municípios' in section_text or 'municipalities' in section_text): municipalities_505_evidence.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': section_content, 'keyword': section['keyword'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for ministry collaboration if ('ministério' in section_text and 'público' in section_text) or 'mpf' in section_text: ministry_collaboration_evidence.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': section_content, 'keyword': section['keyword'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for Sobradinho advocacy evidence if 'sobradinho' in section_text and ('deslocad' in section_text or 'atingid' in section_text or 'advocacia' in section_text or 'defesa' in section_text): sobradinho_advocacy_evidence.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': section_content, 'keyword': section['keyword'], 'url': results['url'] }) # Look for organization identification organizations = ['codevasf', 'cbhsf', 'ana', 'fundaj', 'isa', 'instituto socioambiental', 'mab', 'movimento dos atingidos', 'cpt', 'comissão pastoral'] if any(org in section_text for org in organizations) and ('educação ambiental' in section_text or 'são francisco' in section_text): organization_identification.append({ 'source': page_name, 'section': section_content, 'keyword': section['keyword'], 'url': results['url'], 'organizations_mentioned': [org for org in organizations if org in section_text] }) # Display key findings print(f"\n📋 EXACT PLAN NAME EVIDENCE: {len(exact_plan_evidence)}") for i, evidence in enumerate(exact_plan_evidence[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. From {evidence['source']}:") print(f" {evidence['section'][:500]}...") print(f"\n🏛️ 505 MUNICIPALITIES EVIDENCE: {len(municipalities_505_evidence)}") for i, evidence in enumerate(municipalities_505_evidence[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. From {evidence['source']}:") print(f" {evidence['section'][:500]}...") print(f"\n⚖️ MINISTRY COLLABORATION EVIDENCE: {len(ministry_collaboration_evidence)}") for i, evidence in enumerate(ministry_collaboration_evidence[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. From {evidence['source']}:") print(f" {evidence['section'][:500]}...") print(f"\n🏗️ SOBRADINHO ADVOCACY EVIDENCE: {len(sobradinho_advocacy_evidence)}") for i, evidence in enumerate(sobradinho_advocacy_evidence[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. From {evidence['source']}:") print(f" {evidence['section'][:500]}...") print(f"\n🏢 ORGANIZATION IDENTIFICATION: {len(organization_identification)}") for i, evidence in enumerate(organization_identification[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. From {evidence['source']}:") print(f" Organizations: {', '.join(evidence['organizations_mentioned'])}") print(f" {evidence['section'][:400]}...") # Save comprehensive findings comprehensive_findings = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_statistics': search_stats, 'exact_plan_evidence': exact_plan_evidence, 'municipalities_505_evidence': municipalities_505_evidence, 'ministry_collaboration_evidence': ministry_collaboration_evidence, 'sobradinho_advocacy_evidence': sobradinho_advocacy_evidence, 'organization_identification': organization_identification, 'search_keywords': target_keywords, 'pages_searched': list(search_analysis.keys()) } findings_file = "workspace/final_comprehensive_findings.json" with open(findings_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(comprehensive_findings, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nComprehensive findings saved to {findings_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("ORGANIZATION IDENTIFICATION ANALYSIS") print(f"{'='*80}") # Analyze evidence to identify the most likely organization total_evidence = len(exact_plan_evidence) + len(municipalities_505_evidence) + len(ministry_collaboration_evidence) + len(sobradinho_advocacy_evidence) if total_evidence > 0: print(f"\n✅ FOUND {total_evidence} PIECES OF RELEVANT EVIDENCE") # Count organization mentions across all evidence org_mentions = {} all_evidence = exact_plan_evidence + municipalities_505_evidence + ministry_collaboration_evidence + sobradinho_advocacy_evidence + organization_identification for evidence in all_evidence: section = evidence['section'].lower() # Count specific organizations if 'codevasf' in section: org_mentions['CODEVASF'] = org_mentions.get('CODEVASF', 0) + 1 if 'cbhsf' in section or 'comitê da bacia hidrográfica' in section: org_mentions['CBHSF (Comitê da Bacia Hidrográfica do Rio São Francisco)'] = org_mentions.get('CBHSF (Comitê da Bacia Hidrográfica do Rio São Francisco)', 0) + 1 if 'ana' in section and ('agência nacional' in section or 'águas' in section): org_mentions['ANA (Agência Nacional de Águas)'] = org_mentions.get('ANA (Agência Nacional de Águas)', 0) + 1 if 'fundaj' in section or 'fundação joaquim nabuco' in section: org_mentions['FUNDAJ (Fundação Joaquim Nabuco)'] = org_mentions.get('FUNDAJ (Fundação Joaquim Nabuco)', 0) + 1 if 'instituto socioambiental' in section or 'isa' in section: org_mentions['ISA (Instituto Socioambiental)'] = org_mentions.get('ISA (Instituto Socioambiental)', 0) + 1 if 'movimento dos atingidos' in section or 'mab' in section: org_mentions['MAB (Movimento dos Atingidos por Barragens)'] = org_mentions.get('MAB (Movimento dos Atingidos por Barragens)', 0) + 1 if org_mentions: print(f"\nORGANIZATION MENTIONS IN EVIDENCE:") for org, count in sorted(org_mentions.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True): print(f" - {org}: {count} mentions") most_mentioned_org = max(org_mentions.items(), key=lambda x: x[1]) print(f"\n🎯 MOST LIKELY ORGANIZATION: {most_mentioned_org[0]} ({most_mentioned_org[1]} mentions)") else: print(f"\n⚠️ No specific organization clearly identified from current evidence") print(f"Need to search for more specific sources or use different search terms") print(f"\nNEXT STEPS:") print(f"- Focus on the most mentioned organizations") print(f"- Search for individuals within these organizations") print(f"- Look for specific advocacy work related to Sobradinho Dam") print(f"- Search for collaboration with Ministérios Públicos") else: print(f"\n⚠️ NO DIRECT EVIDENCE FOUND FOR SPECIFIC PLAN") print(f"The 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' covering 505 municipalities") print(f"may not be documented in Wikipedia or may have a different name.") print(f"\nRECOMMENDATIONS:") print(f"- Search government websites and official documents") print(f"- Look for environmental education programs by basin organizations") print(f"- Search for NGO reports and publications") print(f"- Check academic papers and research on São Francisco basin") print(f"\nComprehensive search completed successfully!") print(f"Found {search_stats['total_keywords_found']} total keyword matches across {search_stats['successful_fetches']} pages.")

Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import json import os from datetime import datetime import time print("Conducting web search to identify organization behind 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' covering 505 municipalities...") # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist if not os.path.exists('workspace'): os.makedirs('workspace') # First, let's inspect existing workspace files to understand what we have print("\n=== INSPECTING EXISTING WORKSPACE ===\n") if os.path.exists('workspace'): workspace_files = os.listdir('workspace') print(f"Found {len(workspace_files)} files in workspace:") for file in workspace_files: file_path = os.path.join('workspace', file) file_size = os.path.getsize(file_path) print(f" - {file} ({file_size:,} bytes)") else: print("No workspace directory found") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("WEB SEARCH FOR SÃO FRANCISCO ENVIRONMENTAL EDUCATION PLAN") print(f"{'='*80}") # Based on the PLAN, we need to search for: # 1. Organization that launched 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' # 2. Plan covering 505 municipalities # 3. Organization collaborating with Ministérios Públicos # 4. Individuals who advocated for Sobradinho Dam displaced people # Prepare comprehensive search queries in Portuguese search_queries = [ # Exact plan name searches '"Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco" 505 municípios', 'Plano Educação Ambiental Bacia São Francisco 505 municípios', '"Plano de Educação Ambiental" "Bacia do Rio São Francisco" 505', # Organization + ministry collaboration searches 'Ministérios Públicos educação ambiental São Francisco bacia', 'MPF educação ambiental Rio São Francisco 505 municípios', 'Ministério Público Federal São Francisco educação ambiental', # Sobradinho Dam advocacy searches 'Sobradinho barragem deslocados advocacia ONG', 'atingidos barragem Sobradinho defesa direitos', 'reassentamento Sobradinho advocacia ambiental', # Specific organization searches 'CBHSF educação ambiental 505 municípios', 'CODEVASF educação ambiental bacia São Francisco', 'Instituto Socioambiental São Francisco educação', 'MAB Movimento Atingidos Barragens Sobradinho', 'Comissão Pastoral Terra São Francisco', # General environmental education in basin 'educação ambiental bacia hidrográfica São Francisco', 'programa educação ambiental São Francisco municípios', 'projeto educação ambiental Rio São Francisco' ] print(f"\nPrepared {len(search_queries)} targeted search queries") print("Queries focus on: exact plan name, ministry collaboration, Sobradinho advocacy, and specific organizations") # Initialize search engine searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) # Storage for all search results all_search_results = {} search_summary = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'successful_searches': 0, 'failed_searches': 0, 'total_results': 0 } print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("EXECUTING WEB SEARCHES") print(f"{'='*60}") # Execute each search query for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\n[{i}/{len(search_queries)}] Searching: {query[:60]}{'...' if len(query) > 60 else ''}") try: # Search with multiple backends for better coverage results = searcher.text( query, max_results=10, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing", "yahoo"], safesearch="off", region="pt-br" ) if results: print(f"✓ Found {len(results)} results") all_search_results[f"query_{i}"] = { 'query': query, 'results_count': len(results), 'results': results, 'search_time': datetime.now().isoformat() } search_summary['successful_searches'] += 1 search_summary['total_results'] += len(results) # Display first result for quick assessment if results: first_result = results[0] print(f" Top result: {first_result.get('title', 'No title')[:80]}...") print(f" URL: {first_result.get('href', 'No URL')[:80]}...") else: print(f"✗ No results found") all_search_results[f"query_{i}"] = { 'query': query, 'results_count': 0, 'results': [], 'search_time': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'error': 'No results found' } search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 except Exception as e: print(f"✗ Search error: {str(e)}") all_search_results[f"query_{i}"] = { 'query': query, 'results_count': 0, 'results': [], 'search_time': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'error': str(e) } search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add delay between searches to be respectful time.sleep(2) # Save all search results search_results_file = "workspace/web_search_results.json" with open(search_results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(all_search_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nAll search results saved to {search_results_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("SEARCH RESULTS ANALYSIS") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"\nSEARCH STATISTICS:") print(f"Total queries executed: {search_summary['total_queries']}") print(f"Successful searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}") print(f"Failed searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}") print(f"Total results found: {search_summary['total_results']}") # Analyze results for key evidence print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("ANALYZING RESULTS FOR KEY EVIDENCE") print(f"{'='*60}") # Look for specific evidence patterns exact_plan_mentions = [] municipalities_505_mentions = [] ministry_collaboration = [] sobradinho_advocacy = [] organization_identification = [] for query_key, query_data in all_search_results.items(): if query_data['results_count'] > 0: query_text = query_data['query'] print(f"\n📋 Query: {query_text}") print(f" Results: {query_data['results_count']}") for j, result in enumerate(query_data['results'][:3], 1): # Show top 3 results title = result.get('title', 'No title') href = result.get('href', 'No URL') body = result.get('body', 'No description') print(f"\n {j}. {title[:100]}...") print(f" URL: {href[:100]}...") print(f" Description: {body[:200]}...") # Analyze for specific evidence combined_text = f"{title} {body}".lower() # Check for exact plan name if 'plano de educação ambiental da bacia do rio são francisco' in combined_text: exact_plan_mentions.append({ 'query': query_text, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body }) # Check for 505 municipalities if '505' in combined_text and ('municípios' in combined_text or 'municipalities' in combined_text): municipalities_505_mentions.append({ 'query': query_text, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body }) # Check for ministry collaboration if ('ministério público' in combined_text or 'mpf' in combined_text) and 'educação ambiental' in combined_text: ministry_collaboration.append({ 'query': query_text, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body }) # Check for Sobradinho advocacy if 'sobradinho' in combined_text and ('atingidos' in combined_text or 'deslocados' in combined_text or 'advocacia' in combined_text): sobradinho_advocacy.append({ 'query': query_text, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body }) # Check for organization identification organizations = ['cbhsf', 'codevasf', 'ana', 'isa', 'instituto socioambiental', 'mab', 'movimento dos atingidos', 'cpt', 'comissão pastoral'] mentioned_orgs = [org for org in organizations if org in combined_text] if mentioned_orgs and ('são francisco' in combined_text or 'educação ambiental' in combined_text): organization_identification.append({ 'query': query_text, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body, 'organizations_mentioned': mentioned_orgs }) print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("KEY EVIDENCE SUMMARY") print(f"{'='*60}") print(f"\n🎯 EXACT PLAN NAME MENTIONS: {len(exact_plan_mentions)}") for i, mention in enumerate(exact_plan_mentions[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {mention['title'][:80]}...") print(f" URL: {mention['url'][:80]}...") print(f" Description: {mention['description'][:150]}...") print(f"\n🏛️ 505 MUNICIPALITIES MENTIONS: {len(municipalities_505_mentions)}") for i, mention in enumerate(municipalities_505_mentions[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {mention['title'][:80]}...") print(f" URL: {mention['url'][:80]}...") print(f" Description: {mention['description'][:150]}...") print(f"\n⚖️ MINISTRY COLLABORATION: {len(ministry_collaboration)}") for i, mention in enumerate(ministry_collaboration[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {mention['title'][:80]}...") print(f" URL: {mention['url'][:80]}...") print(f" Description: {mention['description'][:150]}...") print(f"\n🏗️ SOBRADINHO ADVOCACY: {len(sobradinho_advocacy)}") for i, mention in enumerate(sobradinho_advocacy[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {mention['title'][:80]}...") print(f" URL: {mention['url'][:80]}...") print(f" Description: {mention['description'][:150]}...") print(f"\n🏢 ORGANIZATION IDENTIFICATION: {len(organization_identification)}") for i, mention in enumerate(organization_identification[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {mention['title'][:80]}...") print(f" Organizations: {', '.join(mention['organizations_mentioned'])}") print(f" URL: {mention['url'][:80]}...") print(f" Description: {mention['description'][:120]}...") # Save comprehensive analysis comprehensive_analysis = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_summary': search_summary, 'evidence_analysis': { 'exact_plan_mentions': exact_plan_mentions, 'municipalities_505_mentions': municipalities_505_mentions, 'ministry_collaboration': ministry_collaboration, 'sobradinho_advocacy': sobradinho_advocacy, 'organization_identification': organization_identification }, 'search_queries_used': search_queries } analysis_file = "workspace/comprehensive_web_search_analysis.json" with open(analysis_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(comprehensive_analysis, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nComprehensive analysis saved to {analysis_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("PRELIMINARY CONCLUSIONS") print(f"{'='*80}") # Analyze findings to draw preliminary conclusions total_evidence = len(exact_plan_mentions) + len(municipalities_505_mentions) + len(ministry_collaboration) + len(sobradinho_advocacy) if total_evidence > 0: print(f"\n✅ FOUND {total_evidence} PIECES OF RELEVANT EVIDENCE") if exact_plan_mentions: print(f"\n🎯 EXACT PLAN IDENTIFIED:") print(f"Found {len(exact_plan_mentions)} direct mentions of 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco'") if municipalities_505_mentions: print(f"\n🏛️ 505 MUNICIPALITIES CONFIRMED:") print(f"Found {len(municipalities_505_mentions)} mentions of plans covering 505 municipalities") if organization_identification: # Count organization mentions org_counts = {} for mention in organization_identification: for org in mention['organizations_mentioned']: org_counts[org] = org_counts.get(org, 0) + 1 if org_counts: print(f"\n🏢 MOST LIKELY ORGANIZATIONS:") for org, count in sorted(org_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)[:3]: print(f" - {org.upper()}: {count} mentions") print(f"\nNEXT STEPS:") print(f"- Investigate the most promising search results") print(f"- Focus on organizations with highest mention counts") print(f"- Look for specific individuals within identified organizations") print(f"- Search for detailed information about Sobradinho advocacy work") else: print(f"\n⚠️ LIMITED DIRECT EVIDENCE FOUND") print(f"The specific 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' covering 505 municipalities") print(f"may not be widely documented online or may have a different official name.") print(f"\nRECOMMENDATIONS:") print(f"- Try alternative search terms and variations") print(f"- Search government databases and official portals") print(f"- Look for academic papers and research publications") print(f"- Contact environmental organizations directly") print(f"\nWeb search completed successfully!") print(f"Executed {search_summary['successful_searches']} successful searches with {search_summary['total_results']} total results.")

Tester Feedback:
Execution successful - Code ran without errors and completed a comprehensive web search using DuckDuckGo to identify the organization behind 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' covering 505 municipalities. The script executed 17 targeted search queries in Portuguese, successfully found results for most queries (successful_searches: majority completed), and generated a total of several hundred search results. The search strategy was well-designed, focusing on exact plan names, ministry collaboration, Sobradinho advocacy, and specific organizations. However, there's a critical issue: the output shows mixed content again, with both São Francisco environmental education results AND unrelated Conrad II Holy Roman Emperor research appearing in the same execution. This contamination makes it impossible to assess the actual findings for the environmental education plan. The code did find some relevant results including references to 'FOZ DO RIO SÃO FRANCISCO: GOVERNANÇA AMBIENTAL', 'Nova etapa da FPI do São Francisco', and 'Atingidos por barragens acampam por direitos em Sobradinho', which suggests progress toward the PLAN objectives. **PLAN** alignment: 70% - the search strategy and execution were sound, but the mixed output prevents clear assessment of whether the specific organization and individuals were identified. Recommendation: Save the lengthy output to 'workspace/web_search_results_detailed.txt' for future analysis, then execute a clean search focused solely on the most promising results found (particularly the Sobradinho displaced people advocacy organizations) to identify specific individuals within those organizations.
Python Code python
from ddgs import DDGS import json import os from datetime import datetime import time print("Conducting web search to identify organization behind 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' covering 505 municipalities...") # Create workspace directory if it doesn't exist if not os.path.exists('workspace'): os.makedirs('workspace') # First, let's inspect existing workspace files to understand what we have print("\n=== INSPECTING EXISTING WORKSPACE ===\n") if os.path.exists('workspace'): workspace_files = os.listdir('workspace') print(f"Found {len(workspace_files)} files in workspace:") for file in workspace_files: file_path = os.path.join('workspace', file) file_size = os.path.getsize(file_path) print(f" - {file} ({file_size:,} bytes)") else: print("No workspace directory found") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("WEB SEARCH FOR SÃO FRANCISCO ENVIRONMENTAL EDUCATION PLAN") print(f"{'='*80}") # Based on the PLAN, we need to search for: # 1. Organization that launched 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' # 2. Plan covering 505 municipalities # 3. Organization collaborating with Ministérios Públicos # 4. Individuals who advocated for Sobradinho Dam displaced people # Prepare comprehensive search queries in Portuguese search_queries = [ # Exact plan name searches '"Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco" 505 municípios', 'Plano Educação Ambiental Bacia São Francisco 505 municípios', '"Plano de Educação Ambiental" "Bacia do Rio São Francisco" 505', # Organization + ministry collaboration searches 'Ministérios Públicos educação ambiental São Francisco bacia', 'MPF educação ambiental Rio São Francisco 505 municípios', 'Ministério Público Federal São Francisco educação ambiental', # Sobradinho Dam advocacy searches 'Sobradinho barragem deslocados advocacia ONG', 'atingidos barragem Sobradinho defesa direitos', 'reassentamento Sobradinho advocacia ambiental', # Specific organization searches 'CBHSF educação ambiental 505 municípios', 'CODEVASF educação ambiental bacia São Francisco', 'Instituto Socioambiental São Francisco educação', 'MAB Movimento Atingidos Barragens Sobradinho', 'Comissão Pastoral Terra São Francisco', # General environmental education in basin 'educação ambiental bacia hidrográfica São Francisco', 'programa educação ambiental São Francisco municípios', 'projeto educação ambiental Rio São Francisco' ] print(f"\nPrepared {len(search_queries)} targeted search queries") print("Queries focus on: exact plan name, ministry collaboration, Sobradinho advocacy, and specific organizations") # Initialize search engine searcher = DDGS(timeout=15) # Storage for all search results all_search_results = {} search_summary = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'total_queries': len(search_queries), 'successful_searches': 0, 'failed_searches': 0, 'total_results': 0 } print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("EXECUTING WEB SEARCHES") print(f"{'='*60}") # Execute each search query for i, query in enumerate(search_queries, 1): print(f"\n[{i}/{len(search_queries)}] Searching: {query[:60]}{'...' if len(query) > 60 else ''}") try: # Search with multiple backends for better coverage results = searcher.text( query, max_results=10, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing", "yahoo"], safesearch="off", region="pt-br" ) if results: print(f"✓ Found {len(results)} results") all_search_results[f"query_{i}"] = { 'query': query, 'results_count': len(results), 'results': results, 'search_time': datetime.now().isoformat() } search_summary['successful_searches'] += 1 search_summary['total_results'] += len(results) # Display first result for quick assessment if results: first_result = results[0] print(f" Top result: {first_result.get('title', 'No title')[:80]}...") print(f" URL: {first_result.get('href', 'No URL')[:80]}...") else: print(f"✗ No results found") all_search_results[f"query_{i}"] = { 'query': query, 'results_count': 0, 'results': [], 'search_time': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'error': 'No results found' } search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 except Exception as e: print(f"✗ Search error: {str(e)}") all_search_results[f"query_{i}"] = { 'query': query, 'results_count': 0, 'results': [], 'search_time': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'error': str(e) } search_summary['failed_searches'] += 1 # Add delay between searches to be respectful time.sleep(2) # Save all search results search_results_file = "workspace/web_search_results.json" with open(search_results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(all_search_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nAll search results saved to {search_results_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("SEARCH RESULTS ANALYSIS") print(f"{'='*80}") print(f"\nSEARCH STATISTICS:") print(f"Total queries executed: {search_summary['total_queries']}") print(f"Successful searches: {search_summary['successful_searches']}") print(f"Failed searches: {search_summary['failed_searches']}") print(f"Total results found: {search_summary['total_results']}") # Analyze results for key evidence print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("ANALYZING RESULTS FOR KEY EVIDENCE") print(f"{'='*60}") # Look for specific evidence patterns exact_plan_mentions = [] municipalities_505_mentions = [] ministry_collaboration = [] sobradinho_advocacy = [] organization_identification = [] for query_key, query_data in all_search_results.items(): if query_data['results_count'] > 0: query_text = query_data['query'] print(f"\n📋 Query: {query_text}") print(f" Results: {query_data['results_count']}") for j, result in enumerate(query_data['results'][:3], 1): # Show top 3 results title = result.get('title', 'No title') href = result.get('href', 'No URL') body = result.get('body', 'No description') print(f"\n {j}. {title[:100]}...") print(f" URL: {href[:100]}...") print(f" Description: {body[:200]}...") # Analyze for specific evidence combined_text = f"{title} {body}".lower() # Check for exact plan name if 'plano de educação ambiental da bacia do rio são francisco' in combined_text: exact_plan_mentions.append({ 'query': query_text, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body }) # Check for 505 municipalities if '505' in combined_text and ('municípios' in combined_text or 'municipalities' in combined_text): municipalities_505_mentions.append({ 'query': query_text, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body }) # Check for ministry collaboration if ('ministério público' in combined_text or 'mpf' in combined_text) and 'educação ambiental' in combined_text: ministry_collaboration.append({ 'query': query_text, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body }) # Check for Sobradinho advocacy if 'sobradinho' in combined_text and ('atingidos' in combined_text or 'deslocados' in combined_text or 'advocacia' in combined_text): sobradinho_advocacy.append({ 'query': query_text, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body }) # Check for organization identification organizations = ['cbhsf', 'codevasf', 'ana', 'isa', 'instituto socioambiental', 'mab', 'movimento dos atingidos', 'cpt', 'comissão pastoral'] mentioned_orgs = [org for org in organizations if org in combined_text] if mentioned_orgs and ('são francisco' in combined_text or 'educação ambiental' in combined_text): organization_identification.append({ 'query': query_text, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body, 'organizations_mentioned': mentioned_orgs }) print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("KEY EVIDENCE SUMMARY") print(f"{'='*60}") print(f"\n🎯 EXACT PLAN NAME MENTIONS: {len(exact_plan_mentions)}") for i, mention in enumerate(exact_plan_mentions[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {mention['title'][:80]}...") print(f" URL: {mention['url'][:80]}...") print(f" Description: {mention['description'][:150]}...") print(f"\n🏛️ 505 MUNICIPALITIES MENTIONS: {len(municipalities_505_mentions)}") for i, mention in enumerate(municipalities_505_mentions[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {mention['title'][:80]}...") print(f" URL: {mention['url'][:80]}...") print(f" Description: {mention['description'][:150]}...") print(f"\n⚖️ MINISTRY COLLABORATION: {len(ministry_collaboration)}") for i, mention in enumerate(ministry_collaboration[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {mention['title'][:80]}...") print(f" URL: {mention['url'][:80]}...") print(f" Description: {mention['description'][:150]}...") print(f"\n🏗️ SOBRADINHO ADVOCACY: {len(sobradinho_advocacy)}") for i, mention in enumerate(sobradinho_advocacy[:2], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {mention['title'][:80]}...") print(f" URL: {mention['url'][:80]}...") print(f" Description: {mention['description'][:150]}...") print(f"\n🏢 ORGANIZATION IDENTIFICATION: {len(organization_identification)}") for i, mention in enumerate(organization_identification[:3], 1): print(f"\n{i}. {mention['title'][:80]}...") print(f" Organizations: {', '.join(mention['organizations_mentioned'])}") print(f" URL: {mention['url'][:80]}...") print(f" Description: {mention['description'][:120]}...") # Save comprehensive analysis comprehensive_analysis = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'search_summary': search_summary, 'evidence_analysis': { 'exact_plan_mentions': exact_plan_mentions, 'municipalities_505_mentions': municipalities_505_mentions, 'ministry_collaboration': ministry_collaboration, 'sobradinho_advocacy': sobradinho_advocacy, 'organization_identification': organization_identification }, 'search_queries_used': search_queries } analysis_file = "workspace/comprehensive_web_search_analysis.json" with open(analysis_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(comprehensive_analysis, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nComprehensive analysis saved to {analysis_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("PRELIMINARY CONCLUSIONS") print(f"{'='*80}") # Analyze findings to draw preliminary conclusions total_evidence = len(exact_plan_mentions) + len(municipalities_505_mentions) + len(ministry_collaboration) + len(sobradinho_advocacy) if total_evidence > 0: print(f"\n✅ FOUND {total_evidence} PIECES OF RELEVANT EVIDENCE") if exact_plan_mentions: print(f"\n🎯 EXACT PLAN IDENTIFIED:") print(f"Found {len(exact_plan_mentions)} direct mentions of 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco'") if municipalities_505_mentions: print(f"\n🏛️ 505 MUNICIPALITIES CONFIRMED:") print(f"Found {len(municipalities_505_mentions)} mentions of plans covering 505 municipalities") if organization_identification: # Count organization mentions org_counts = {} for mention in organization_identification: for org in mention['organizations_mentioned']: org_counts[org] = org_counts.get(org, 0) + 1 if org_counts: print(f"\n🏢 MOST LIKELY ORGANIZATIONS:") for org, count in sorted(org_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)[:3]: print(f" - {org.upper()}: {count} mentions") print(f"\nNEXT STEPS:") print(f"- Investigate the most promising search results") print(f"- Focus on organizations with highest mention counts") print(f"- Look for specific individuals within identified organizations") print(f"- Search for detailed information about Sobradinho advocacy work") else: print(f"\n⚠️ LIMITED DIRECT EVIDENCE FOUND") print(f"The specific 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' covering 505 municipalities") print(f"may not be widely documented online or may have a different official name.") print(f"\nRECOMMENDATIONS:") print(f"- Try alternative search terms and variations") print(f"- Search government databases and official portals") print(f"- Look for academic papers and research publications") print(f"- Contact environmental organizations directly") print(f"\nWeb search completed successfully!") print(f"Executed {search_summary['successful_searches']} successful searches with {search_summary['total_results']} total results.")

import json import os from datetime import datetime from ddgs import DDGS import time print("Executing clean, focused search for 'Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco' organization...") # First, inspect existing workspace files to understand what clean data we have print("\n=== INSPECTING WORKSPACE FOR RELEVANT FILES ===\n") if os.path.exists('workspace'): workspace_files = os.listdir('workspace') relevant_files = [f for f in workspace_files if 'sao_francisco' in f.lower() or 'search' in f.lower() or 'comprehensive' in f.lower()] print(f"Found {len(relevant_files)} potentially relevant files:") for file in relevant_files: file_path = os.path.join('workspace', file) file_size = os.path.getsize(file_path) print(f" - {file} ({file_size:,} bytes)") else: print("No workspace directory found - creating new workspace") os.makedirs('workspace') # Let's inspect the most promising file to understand what we already have if os.path.exists('workspace/comprehensive_search_results.json'): print("\n=== INSPECTING COMPREHENSIVE SEARCH RESULTS ===\n") try: with open('workspace/comprehensive_search_results.json', 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f: existing_data = json.load(f) print(f"File structure: {type(existing_data).__name__}") if isinstance(existing_data, dict): print(f"Top-level keys: {list(existing_data.keys())[:5]}{'...' if len(existing_data.keys()) > 5 else ''}") # Look for evidence of the specific plan for key, value in existing_data.items(): if isinstance(value, dict) and 'found_keywords' in value: keywords = value.get('found_keywords', []) if keywords: print(f" {key}: {len(keywords)} keywords found - {', '.join(keywords[:3])}{'...' if len(keywords) > 3 else ''}") except Exception as e: print(f"Error reading comprehensive search results: {str(e)[:100]}...") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("FOCUSED WEB SEARCH FOR SÃO FRANCISCO ENVIRONMENTAL EDUCATION PLAN") print(f"{'='*80}") # Clean, targeted search queries specifically for the environmental education plan focused_queries = [ # Most specific searches first '"Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco" 505 municípios', 'educação ambiental bacia São Francisco 505 municípios ministério público', 'CBHSF educação ambiental 505 municípios', 'CODEVASF educação ambiental São Francisco municípios', # Sobradinho Dam advocacy searches 'Sobradinho barragem atingidos advocacia direitos', 'MAB Movimento Atingidos Barragens Sobradinho', 'deslocados Sobradinho barragem advocacia', # Ministry collaboration searches 'Ministério Público Federal educação ambiental São Francisco', 'MPF bacia São Francisco educação ambiental', # Organization-specific searches 'Instituto Socioambiental São Francisco educação ambiental', 'Comissão Pastoral Terra São Francisco atingidos' ] print(f"\nExecuting {len(focused_queries)} focused search queries...") print("Focus: Clean search for environmental education plan and Sobradinho advocacy organizations") # Initialize search with clean parameters searcher = DDGS(timeout=20) # Storage for clean search results clean_search_results = { 'search_date': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'objective': 'Identify organization behind Plano de Educação Ambiental da Bacia do Rio São Francisco covering 505 municipalities', 'queries_executed': [], 'total_results_found': 0, 'evidence_found': { 'exact_plan_mentions': [], 'municipalities_505': [], 'ministry_collaboration': [], 'sobradinho_advocacy': [], 'organization_identification': [] } } print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("EXECUTING CLEAN WEB SEARCHES") print(f"{'='*60}") # Execute each focused query for i, query in enumerate(focused_queries, 1): print(f"\n[{i}/{len(focused_queries)}] Searching: {query[:70]}{'...' if len(query) > 70 else ''}") try: # Search with Brazilian Portuguese focus results = searcher.text( query, max_results=8, page=1, backend=["google", "duckduckgo", "bing"], safesearch="off", region="pt-br" ) if results: print(f"✓ Found {len(results)} results") query_data = { 'query': query, 'results_count': len(results), 'results': results, 'search_time': datetime.now().isoformat() } clean_search_results['queries_executed'].append(query_data) clean_search_results['total_results_found'] += len(results) # Analyze each result for evidence for j, result in enumerate(results[:3], 1): # Analyze top 3 results title = result.get('title', 'No title') href = result.get('href', 'No URL') body = result.get('body', 'No description') print(f" {j}. {title[:80]}{'...' if len(title) > 80 else ''}") print(f" URL: {href[:80]}{'...' if len(href) > 80 else ''}") # Analyze for specific evidence combined_text = f"{title} {body}".lower() # Evidence 1: Exact plan name if 'plano de educação ambiental da bacia do rio são francisco' in combined_text: evidence = { 'query': query, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body, 'evidence_type': 'exact_plan_name' } clean_search_results['evidence_found']['exact_plan_mentions'].append(evidence) print(f" 🎯 EXACT PLAN NAME FOUND!") # Evidence 2: 505 municipalities if '505' in combined_text and ('municípios' in combined_text or 'municipalities' in combined_text): evidence = { 'query': query, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body, 'evidence_type': '505_municipalities' } clean_search_results['evidence_found']['municipalities_505'].append(evidence) print(f" 🏛️ 505 MUNICIPALITIES FOUND!") # Evidence 3: Ministry collaboration if ('ministério público' in combined_text or 'mpf' in combined_text) and ('educação ambiental' in combined_text or 'são francisco' in combined_text): evidence = { 'query': query, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body, 'evidence_type': 'ministry_collaboration' } clean_search_results['evidence_found']['ministry_collaboration'].append(evidence) print(f" ⚖️ MINISTRY COLLABORATION FOUND!") # Evidence 4: Sobradinho advocacy if 'sobradinho' in combined_text and ('atingidos' in combined_text or 'deslocados' in combined_text or 'advocacia' in combined_text or 'direitos' in combined_text): evidence = { 'query': query, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body, 'evidence_type': 'sobradinho_advocacy' } clean_search_results['evidence_found']['sobradinho_advocacy'].append(evidence) print(f" 🏗️ SOBRADINHO ADVOCACY FOUND!") # Evidence 5: Organization identification organizations = ['cbhsf', 'codevasf', 'ana', 'isa', 'instituto socioambiental', 'mab', 'movimento dos atingidos', 'cpt', 'comissão pastoral'] mentioned_orgs = [org for org in organizations if org in combined_text] if mentioned_orgs and ('são francisco' in combined_text or 'educação ambiental' in combined_text or 'atingidos' in combined_text): evidence = { 'query': query, 'title': title, 'url': href, 'description': body, 'organizations_mentioned': mentioned_orgs, 'evidence_type': 'organization_identification' } clean_search_results['evidence_found']['organization_identification'].append(evidence) print(f" 🏢 ORGANIZATIONS FOUND: {', '.join(mentioned_orgs)}") else: print(f"✗ No results found") query_data = { 'query': query, 'results_count': 0, 'results': [], 'search_time': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'status': 'no_results' } clean_search_results['queries_executed'].append(query_data) except Exception as e: print(f"✗ Search error: {str(e)}") query_data = { 'query': query, 'results_count': 0, 'results': [], 'search_time': datetime.now().isoformat(), 'error': str(e) } clean_search_results['queries_executed'].append(query_data) # Add delay between searches time.sleep(2) # Save clean search results clean_results_file = "workspace/clean_search_results.json" with open(clean_results_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: json.dump(clean_search_results, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False) print(f"\nClean search results saved to {clean_results_file}") print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("CLEAN SEARCH RESULTS ANALYSIS") print(f"{'='*80}") # Generate summary statistics search_stats = { 'queries_executed': len(clean_search_results['queries_executed']), 'total_results_found': clean_search_results['total_results_found'], 'successful_queries': len([q for q in clean_search_results['queries_executed'] if q['results_count'] > 0]), 'failed_queries': len([q for q in clean_search_results['queries_executed'] if q['results_count'] == 0]) } print(f"\nSEARCH STATISTICS:") print(f"Queries executed: {search_stats['queries_executed']}") print(f"Successful queries: {search_stats['successful_queries']}") print(f"Failed queries: {search_stats['failed_queries']}") print(f"Total results found: {search_stats['total_results_found']}") # Analyze evidence found evidence_summary = clean_search_results['evidence_found'] total_evidence = sum(len(evidence_list) for evidence_list in evidence_summary.values()) print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("EVIDENCE ANALYSIS") print(f"{'='*60}") print(f"\nTOTAL EVIDENCE PIECES FOUND: {total_evidence}") for evidence_type, evidence_list in evidence_summary.items(): if evidence_list: print(f"\n📋 {evidence_type.upper().replace('_', ' ')}: {len(evidence_list)}") for i, evidence in enumerate(evidence_list[:2], 1): # Show top 2 pieces of evidence print(f"\n{i}. {evidence['title'][:100]}{'...' if len(evidence['title']) > 100 else ''}") print(f" URL: {evidence['url'][:100]}{'...' if len(evidence['url']) > 100 else ''}") print(f" Description: {evidence['description'][:150]}{'...' if len(evidence['description']) > 150 else ''}") if 'organizations_mentioned' in evidence: print(f" Organizations: {', '.join(evidence['organizations_mentioned'])}") # Identify most likely organizations print(f"\n{'='*60}") print("ORGANIZATION IDENTIFICATION") print(f"{'='*60}") org_mentions = {} for evidence in evidence_summary['organization_identification']: for org in evidence.get('organizations_mentioned', []): org_mentions[org] = org_mentions.get(org, 0) + 1 if org_mentions: print(f"\nMOST MENTIONED ORGANIZATIONS:") for org, count in sorted(org_mentions.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True): org_name = { 'cbhsf': 'CBHSF (Comitê da Bacia Hidrográfica do Rio São Francisco)', 'codevasf': 'CODEVASF (Companhia de Desenvolvimento dos Vales do São Francisco e do Parnaíba)', 'ana': 'ANA (Agência Nacional de Águas)', 'isa': 'ISA (Instituto Socioambiental)', 'instituto socioambiental': 'ISA (Instituto Socioambiental)', 'mab': 'MAB (Movimento dos Atingidos por Barragens)', 'movimento dos atingidos': 'MAB (Movimento dos Atingidos por Barragens)', 'cpt': 'CPT (Comissão Pastoral da Terra)', 'comissão pastoral': 'CPT (Comissão Pastoral da Terra)' }.get(org, org.upper()) print(f" - {org_name}: {count} mentions") # Final conclusions print(f"\n{'='*80}") print("PRELIMINARY CONCLUSIONS") print(f"{'='*80}") if total_evidence > 0: print(f"\n✅ FOUND {total_evidence} PIECES OF RELEVANT EVIDENCE") if evidence_summary['exact_plan_mentions']: print(f"\n🎯 SUCCESS: Found direct mentions of the specific environmental education plan!") if evidence_summary['sobradinho_advocacy']: print(f"\n🏗️ SUCCESS: Found {len(evidence_summary['sobradinho_advocacy'])} references to Sobradinho Dam advocacy!") print(f" This indicates organizations and individuals working with displaced people.") if org_mentions: most_mentioned = max(org_mentions.items(), key=lambda x: x[1]) print(f"\n🏢 MOST LIKELY ORGANIZATION: {most_mentioned[0].upper()} ({most_mentioned[1]} mentions)") print(f"\nNEXT STEPS:") print(f"1. Focus on the most mentioned organizations for detailed investigation") print(f"2. Search for specific individuals within these organizations") print(f"3. Look for detailed information about their Sobradinho advocacy work") print(f"4. Investigate their collaboration with Ministérios Públicos") else: print(f"\n⚠️ LIMITED EVIDENCE FOUND") print(f"The specific plan may not be widely documented online or may have different terminology.") print(f"Consider searching government databases, NGO websites, and academic publications.") print(f"\nClean, focused search completed successfully!") print(f"Executed {search_stats['successful_queries']} successful searches with {search_stats['total_results_found']} total results.")
